name: Bouncy Soul
description:
A 2017 IOS and Andriod game

No longer available on either app store

Description

Guide your soul through as many Heaven's Gates as possible.  Bouncing through this ethereal world of unending gates is a matter of survival and fast thinking.  Gates materialize as they approach and you must quickly decide where your soul should move (which is accomplished by swiping left or right or tapping to bounce).  With a single life, your soul is depending on you to pass through as many gates as possible.  Rumor is, there's an Easter Egg (or Golden Chalice) to be found!  First, you must obtain all rewards, then the glorious Chalice awaits!

How to/Tips
  • Press Space to Tap
  • Use Left Arrow and Right Arrow to change lanes
  • Removed the leaderboard button and sound toggle 
  • Press the Eye Icon in the top left to try out the 3 perspectives
Post-Mortem

Bouncy soul was a 2017 IOS and Andriod game published to both the App Store and Google Play Store. The game was an attempt to put a twist on the Flappy Bird genre. The game allows the player to bounce (flap) up and down to make it through the gates (pipes). It also introduced a 3 lane design to it, similar to Subway Surfer. The player is tasked with both bouncing and changing to the lane with the open gate.
